description: Maps the enum HarshAccelTypeEnum from hubproto to the corresponding harsh event [harsh_event.proto definition](https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/master/go/src/samsaradev.io/hubproto/harsh_event.proto)

schema.name: enum
schema.description: A key indicating the type of harsh accelerometer event

schema.name: event_type
schema.description: The name of the harsh accelerometer event (e.g., 'haBraking', 'haSharpTurn', 'haEvent', 'haCrash')
